If we allow them to go this far, our “United Nations” will be “welcomed” into the Fallen Anu-Seraphim Anun- naki controlled “Federation of Planets”, which is a cover-name stolen from a once-valid Emerald Covenant collective, that is now used to refer to territo- ries conquered by the Anu-Seraphim Anunnaki; territories that exist under full Anunnaki totalitarian exploitation and dominion. Then and only then, will the final phase of the invasion plan be set in motion.
